Description: On VA-28 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Willard Rd; Rt. 8457W (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-85 at mile marker 64.2 in the County of Dinwiddie, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 13 in the County of Warren, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The west exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
